value:
I'll guess the image that "3,000-year-
old in a swimsuit" conjures up doesn't
match the reality... Does it?

That resort was beautiful...but far too
hot to take a decent nap. I think I'll
be able to rest here, though.

It's good to take a break now and
again. I just learned a fun game we
can play, actually...$k$pYou put on a blindfold and then try
to smash a large melon. Want to try?

Why don't you put on a bathing suit?
Look at me—I'm the divine dragon's
oracle!$k$pIf I'm dressed like this, nobody will
even blink to see the Summoner in
summer attire.

Does the Askran Kingdom have
beautiful oceans?$k$pWe must do all we can to ensure the
waters of this kingdom do not run
red...

I bring greetings from
$Nf.$k$pMy attire? If you don't consider it
appropriate for the circumstances, I
could always turn into a dragon.

In a swimsuit, no less. At my age,
you take whatever you can get!

Keeping cool in the summer—
that's my secret.

Maybe I'm getting a little old to
fight in a swimsuit...

Thanks for this. I'll treasure my
memory of this summer with you.

I'm Tiki, a descendant of the divine
dragon tribe. I can take the form of a
dragon, of course...$k$pBut for the summer, I'm liking the
look of this swimsuit a little bit better!

Thanks for taking the time to come
and see me, even with this heat... Or
is it just me? $k$pWe Heroes who dropped in from the
resort seem to be stuck in an eternal
summer... I'm not sure why.$k$pThis world is certainly mysterious. I've
seen so many summers, but none
have been as thrilling as this one.$k$pI thought I'd gotten to an age where
nothing could surprise me, but I was
wrong about that!$k$pThis summer has filled me with the joy
of a child. I find myself wishing it
would not end. $k$pI want to stay here with you.
えい！
せやっ！
ぐっ…！
Now I'm awake.
You will burn.
I'll bury you at sea.
You'll be a memory.
Tropical attack!
It's over...
Ehee...
I wear this when I swim. Do you like it?
I love the ocean. It goes on forever...
I'm ready to bury myself in the sand and take a long nap.
Too much swimming makes my skin scaly.
I will always remember this summer with you.
I don't think I'll ever get used to fighting in a swimsuit...
Each summer comes but once. Don't waste this one.
Hm?
*yawn*
Time for a swim.
Even as long as I've lived, I never tire of summer.
